location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 63 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Muscat to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication (No 1134), which defined the degree of authority that the Resident has over the marine force in the Persian Gulf.
